summary: Upgradable Drainblood Drainspell and Drainheart Weapons + bonus
descriptionHtml:
[b]Hello there[/b]

Here you go, small modification of draugr weapons set.  Adds the Drainspell Bow, Drainblood Axe and Drainheart Sword to the tempering list. Beside this, i was repair charge/cost of this weapons multiply uses by 100. What does it mean? Till modificacion Drainsword was 25/1 = 25 uses. After modification is 25/1=250 uses. 

I change enchanting either. At now bow absorb 15 points of stamina, sword absorb 15 points of health and axe absorb 15 points of magicka.

Requerments: 1 steel ingot + 1 ectoplasm

[b]Install:
just put it on data folder.[/b]
author: nerevarnus
